list.name: Changes
list.comment:
refactor(project): restructure files into `packages/ui-react`
Moved all project files into the `packages/ui-react` directory for better organization and modularity. Updated paths, configurations, and scripts to align with the new structure, ensuring compatibility and functionality remain intact.

option.name: originalMessage
option.value:
feat(theme): integrate @udixio/theme and migrate configs
Replaces @udixio/tailwind-material with @udixio/theme for theme configuration and simplifies Tailwind setup. Introduces a new `theme.config.ts` file for defining theme customizations. Additionally, updates dependencies including `react-textarea-autosize` and adjusts references to color variables in the code.

option.name: rewordedMessage
option.value:
fix(theme): integrate @udixio/theme and migrate configs
Replaces @udixio/tailwind-material with @udixio/theme for theme configuration and simplifies Tailwind setup. Introduces a new `theme.config.ts` file for defining theme customizations. Additionally, updates dependencies including `react-textarea-autosize` and adjusts references to color variables in the code.

task.summary: Default task

refactor(components): update typings and simplify imports
Replaced component-specific prop types with a generic `ReactProps` utility for consistency and clarity. Updated imports across multiple components to align with the new typing structure. Improved maintainability and reduced redundancy in prop type definitions.

refactor(dependencies): replace framer-motion with motion
Replaced all imports of `framer-motion` with `motion/react` across components and effects. Updated `package.json` to reflect the dependency change and aligned imports accordingly for consistency and compatibility.

refactor(components): update typings and adjust imports
Replaced specific typing imports with consolidated types (e.g., `React.MouseEvent` to `MouseEvent`) for improved consistency. Simplified imports across multiple components and removed unused or redundant props. Enhanced maintainability and reduced code clutter in affected files.

refactor(components): update typings and adjust imports
Replaced specific typing imports with consolidated types (e.g., `React.MouseEvent` to `MouseEvent`) for improved consistency. Simplified imports across multiple components and removed unused or redundant props. Enhanced maintainability and reduced code clutter in affected files.

refactor(components): rename and update TextField structure
Moved and renamed TextField-related files to align with project conventions. Updated imports, typings, and definitions to improve consistency and maintainability. Simplified type usage by replacing redundant props and consolidating interfaces.

refactor(components): centralize exports for reusable modules
Created index files for components, interfaces, styles, and effects to centralize exports and improve scalability. Updated all related imports to use the new index files, reducing redundancy and improving maintainability across the codebase.

refactor(styles): improve classNames handling in getClassNames
Updated `getClassNames` to ensure proper initialization for className arrays. Removed unnecessary `undefined` checks in `defaultClassNames` to simplify typing and improve code consistency.

refactor(stories): update typings to use ReactProps utility
Replaced specific prop types with the generic `ReactProps` utility across all story files for uniformity. Simplified typings by adapting component interfaces, enhancing maintainability and consistency throughout the stories.

refactor(styles): allow undefined in classNameList typings
Updated `getClassNames` typings to support `undefined` in `classNameList` for better flexibility. Adjusted related typings to ensure proper handling of optional class names and improve code robustness.

refactor(components): update typings and adjust imports
Refined typings by centralizing `ReactProps` usage and updating interfaces for better consistency. Simplified imports by leveraging index files and adjusted props in stories to match the updated structures. Improved maintainability and reduced redundancy across components and stories.

refactor(workflows): migrate from npm to pnpm
Replaced `npm` commands with `pnpm` equivalents in GitHub Actions workflows for testing, linting, and deployment. Added pnpm setup action to ensure compatibility and used `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile` for dependency installation. Improved workflow efficiency and consistency by adopting pnpm.

refactor(dependencies): remove package-lock.json
Deleted `package-lock.json` to finalize the migration from npm to pnpm. Ensures consistency with the new package manager and prevents conflicts caused by multiple lock files. The project now adheres to pnpm's dependency management fully.

refactor(interfaces): simplify Props declaration
Replaced `export type` and `export interface` with `type` and `interface` respectively to align with coding standards. Ensures consistency and readability across interface declarations.

refactor(components): remove unused MouseEvent import
Eliminated the unused `MouseEvent` import from `Button` component to tidy up code and reduce redundancy. Adjusted the `onClick` handler to use a generic `any` type for parameter typing simplification.

refactor(imports): simplify and centralize import paths
Reorganized imports across components, styles, and interfaces to utilize centralized index files. Removed redundant and deeply nested imports, improving maintainability and reducing potential path inconsistencies.

refactor(typings): enhance ReactProps and integrate MotionProps
Updated `ReactProps` to improve flexibility

refactor(typings): replace ReactProps with MotionProps
Updated `Switch` and `Tab` components to use `MotionProps` instead of `ReactProps` for improved consistency with motion-related components. Adjusted default values and typings to enhance type safety and maintainability.

**refactor(components): replace ReactProps with MotionProps in Snackbar**
Updated the `Snackbar` component to use `MotionProps` instead of `ReactProps` for improved consistency with other motion-related components. This aligns the typings more closely with motion-specific requirements

refactor(scripts): remove lint script and husky configuration
Deleted the `lint` script and `husky` pre-commit hooks to simplify the project setup. Streamlined the package by removing unused configurations, reducing noise and unnecessary overhead.

refactor(workflows): comment out lint steps in workflows
Commented out the lint steps in `develop.yml`, `release.yml`, and `hotfix.yml` to align with the project's recent removal of the lint script. This simplifies the workflows and ensures they do not reference deprecated configurations.

refactor(dependencies): remove unused packages
Removed `ctix` and other unreferenced dependencies to streamline the project. This reduces bloated package files and ensures only essential dependencies are included.

refactor(styles): rename `item` to `carouselItem` for clarity
Updated variable names and class references from `item` to `carouselItem` in styles, interfaces, and components. This improves readability and better aligns with the carousel-specific naming convention.

feat(components): add NavigationRail and NavigationRailItem
Introduced `NavigationRail` and `NavigationRailItem` components for enhanced navigation support. Implemented styles, interfaces, and Storybook stories to support both vertical and horizontal variants with icons and labels. Added utility for string manipulation and updated class handling for improved styling.
fix(styles): reorder classNames

feat(components): implement NavigationRail and related styles
Added `NavigationRail` component with support for extended and aligned configurations. Introduced associated interfaces, styles, and Storybook stories to illustrate usage and functionalities.

feat(styles): add `segments` element and improve class handling
Introduced the `segments` element in `NavigationRail` interface and applied related styles. Refactored class implementations for better structure and maintainability. This enhances the component's styling and adds additional customization options.

feat(components): enhance NavigationRail with extended menu options
Added menu toggle functionality to `NavigationRail` with support for customizable icons and labels. Updated styles and interfaces for better alignment and extended state handling. Refactored related elements to improve usability and maintainability.

feat(components): add size variants to IconButton
Introduced `size` property to `IconButton` with predefined variants (`xSmall`, `small`, `medium`, `large`, `xLarge`) for responsive design. Updated styles, interfaces, and Storybook stories to support and demonstrate the new functionality. Refactored related class handling to ensure proper alignment and consistency.

refactor(styles): simplify and reorder NavigationRail styles
Reorganized `NavigationRail` styles for better readability and maintainability. Simplified `header` and `segments` classes by removing unnecessary conditions and improving alignment handling. Updated `menuIcon` with consistent spacing for enhanced layout structure.

feat(components): add transition support to NavigationRail
Integrated `transition` property across `NavigationRail`, `NavigationRailItem`, and `Fab` components for enhanced animation capabilities. Updated associated interfaces, styles, and Storybook stories to support this feature. Refactored and optimized related classes to ensure smooth transitions and better maintainability.

refactor(styles): update NavigationRailItem dimensions and gaps
Added fixed height to `navigationRailItem` for consistent layout and adjusted gap conditions for better spacing control. These changes enhance visual alignment and maintainability of the component's styles.

feat(components): add NavigationRailSection for grouping items
Introduced `NavigationRailSection` to group and label related `NavigationRailItem`s. Updated `NavigationRail` logic to handle `extendedOnly` and `isExtended` states for conditional rendering. Enhanced Storybook stories to showcase the new functionality.

feat(workflows): refine release process with distribution tags
Updated GitHub Actions workflows to introduce distribution tags (`latest`, `next`, `beta`) for semantic releases. Enhanced `release.config.js` to support conditional versioning and tagging rules. Improved documentation with details about release channels and branch strategy.

refactor(interfaces): update import path and export type in NavProps
Changed `ActionOrLink` import path to align with updated structure and exported `NavProps` type for wider accessibility. These changes enhance code organization and maintain consistency across modules.

feat(dependencies): add lodash-es and update imports
Added `lodash-es` dependency for tree-shakable imports to improve bundle size. Refactored `throttle` import in `custom-scroll.effect.tsx` to utilize specific path from `lodash`. Updated lockfile to include changes.

feat(config): add DTS configuration with Rollup external support
Introduced `dts.config.js` to configure DTS with Rollup support. Specified `lodash-es` as an external dependency to optimize library build output and avoid bundling unnecessary modules.

refactor(config): enhance Rollup configuration in DTS setup
Updated `rollup` function in `dts.config.js` to dynamically mark `lodash-es` as external. This approach ensures broader compatibility and optimizes the configuration by handling various external formats seamlessly.

refactor(dependencies): remove lodash and switch to lodash-es
Replaced `lodash` with `lodash-es` for better tree-shaking support. Updated all relevant imports and added TypeScript types for `lodash-es`. Adjusted the package list and lockfile to reflect these changes.

refactor(dependencies): replace lodash-es with throttle-debounce
Removed `lodash-es` and added `throttle-debounce` for throttling functionality. Updated relevant imports and TypeScript types. Adjusted the package.json and lockfile to reflect these changes.

feat(ci): add semantic-release and new release workflow
Introduced a GitHub Actions workflow for semantic versioning using `semantic-release`. Added configurations to handle branch-specific pre-releases and integrated dependencies setup with app token generation for automated publishing.

feat(config): enhance release configuration for prereleases
Updated `release.config.js`

refactor(ci): clean up release workflow steps formatting
Removed unnecessary whitespaces in the release workflow file for better readability. This enhances the maintainability of the CI configuration without altering functionality.

feat(ci): improve release workflow with auto version PRs
Enhanced the release workflow to create pull requests with version changes after completing semantic-release. This addition ensures better visibility and traceability of version updates while maintaining automation. Updated

refactor(ui): enhance NavigationRail component styling
Updated the NavigationRail component for improved layout flexibility and standardization. Adjusted styles, added new dynamic properties, and refined spacing for better responsiveness and visual alignment.

fix(ui): rename NavigationRail props for clarity
Renamed NavigationRail props such as `selectedTab` to `selectedItem` and updated associated handlers for better semantic clarity. Removed redundant `uuid` generation and added `onExtendedChange` prop to enhance customization.

fix(ui): adjust NavigationRail spacing for alignment
Updated the NavigationRail component to replace left margin with horizontal spacing (mx-5) for improved visual alignment. This change ensures consistent spacing and better adherence to the design system.

fix(ui): handle React fragments in NavigationRail children
Added recursive flattening of child nodes to handle React.Fragment elements in the NavigationRail component. This ensures proper rendering and compatibility with complex child structures.

fix(ui): refine type check for React.Fragment in flattenChildren
Updated the `flattenChildren` function to include type-safe checks for React.Fragment. This ensures compatibility with TypeScript and prevents potential runtime errors when handling child nodes.

refactor(project): restructure files into `packages/ui-react`
Moved all project files into the `packages/ui-react` directory for better organization and modularity. Updated paths, configurations, and scripts to align with the new structure, ensuring compatibility and functionality remain intact.

MESSAGE.value:
feat(components): add NavigationRailSection for grouping items
Introduced `NavigationRailSection` to group and label related `NavigationRailItem`s. Updated `NavigationRail` logic to handle `extendedOnly`

feat(workflows): refine release process with distribution tags
Updated GitHub Actions workflows to introduce distribution tags (`latest`, `next`, `beta`) for semantic releases. Enhanced `release.config.js` to support conditional versioning and tagging rules. Improved documentation with details

refactor(interfaces): update import path and export type in NavProps
Changed `ActionOrLink` import path to align with updated structure and exported `NavProps` type for wider accessibility. These changes enhance code organization and maintain consistency across modules.

feat(dependencies): add lodash-es and update imports
Added `lodash-es` dependency for tree-shakable imports to improve bundle size. Refactored `throttle` import in `custom-scroll.effect.tsx` to utilize specific path from `lodash`. Updated lockfile to include changes.

feat(config): add DTS configuration with Rollup external support
Introduced `dts.config.js` to configure DTS with Rollup support. Specified `lodash-es` as an external dependency to optimize library build output and avoid bundling unnecessary modules.

refactor(config): enhance Rollup configuration in DTS setup
Updated `rollup` function in `dts.config.js` to dynamically mark `lodash-es` as external. This approach ensures broader compatibility and optimizes the configuration by handling various external formats seamlessly.

refactor(dependencies): remove lodash and switch to lodash-es
Replaced `lodash` with `lodash-es` for better tree-shaking support. Updated all relevant imports and added TypeScript types for `lodash-es`. Adjusted the package list and lockfile to reflect these changes.

refactor(dependencies): replace lodash-es with throttle-debounce
Removed `lodash-es` and added `throttle-debounce` for throttling functionality. Updated relevant imports and TypeScript types. Adjusted the package.json and lockfile to reflect these changes.

feat(ci): add semantic-release and new release workflow
Introduced a GitHub Actions workflow for semantic versioning using `semantic-release`. Added configurations to handle branch-specific pre-releases and integrated dependencies setup with app token generation for automated publishing.

feat(config): enhance release configuration for prereleases
Updated `release.config

feat(config): enhance release configuration for prereleases
Updated `release.config to dynamically determine prerelease names based on branch patterns. Added `failComment: false` to the GitHub plugin for better customization and streamlined release processes.

refactor(ci): clean up release workflow steps formatting
Removed unnecessary whitespaces in the release workflow file for better readability. This enhances the maintainability of the CI configuration without altering functionality.

feat(ci): improve release workflow with auto version PRs
Enhanced the release workflow to create pull requests with version changes after completing semantic-release. This addition ensures better visibility and traceability of version updates while maintaining automation

feat(ci): improve release workflow with auto version PRs
Enhanced the release workflow to create pull requests with version changes after completing semantic-release. This addition ensures better visibility and traceability of version updates while maintaining automation configuration to include a conditional workflow trigger for push events.

fix(ui): enhance NavigationRail component styling
Updated the NavigationRail component for improved layout flexibility and standardization. Adjusted styles, added new dynamic properties, and refined spacing for better responsiveness and visual alignment.

fix(ui): enhance NavigationRail component styling
Updated the NavigationRail component for improved layout flexibility and standardization. Adjusted styles, added new dynamic properties, and refined spacing for better responsiveness and visual alignment.

refactor(ui): enhance NavigationRail component styling
Updated the NavigationRail component for improved layout flexibility and standardization. Adjusted styles, added new dynamic properties, and refined spacing for better responsiveness and visual alignment.

chore(release): 1.7.0 [skip ci]
# [1.7.0](https://github.com/Udixio/UI/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.0) (2025-07-10)
### Bug Fixes
* **ui:** enhance NavigationRail component styling ([a31ecfe](https://github.com/Udixio/UI/commit/a31ecfe9b9143d4450c2f2f58fcc74fa0cac4515))
### Features
* **workflows:** refine release process with distribution tags ([008c9e4](https://github.com/Udixio/UI/commit/008c9e4d5db9bace868322964f1db3ca04d96b7c))

fix(ui): rename NavigationRail props for clarity
Renamed NavigationRail props such as `selectedTab` to `selectedItem` and updated associated handlers for better semantic clarity. Removed redundant `uuid` generation and added `onExtendedChange` prop to enhance customization.

fix(ui): adjust NavigationRail spacing for alignment
Updated the NavigationRail component to replace left margin with horizontal spacing (mx-5) for improved visual alignment. This change ensures consistent spacing and better adherence to the design system.

fix(ui): handle React fragments in NavigationRail children
Updated NavigationRail component to recursively flatten child nodes, handling React.Fragment elements. This improves compatibility and ensures correct rendering of children structure.

fix(ui): handle React fragments in NavigationRail children
Added recursive flattening of child nodes to handle React.Fragment elements in the NavigationRail component. This ensures proper rendering and compatibility with complex child structures.

fix(ui): refine type check for React.Fragment in flattenChildren
Updated the `flattenChildren` function to include type-safe checks for React.Fragment. This ensures compatibility with TypeScript and prevents potential runtime errors when handling child nodes.

refactor(project): restructure files into `packages/ui-react`
Moved all project files into the `packages/ui-react` directory for better organization and modularity. Updated paths, configurations, and scripts to align with the new structure, ensuring compatibility and functionality remain intact.

feat(nx): add initial Nx workspace configuration
Added `.nx/workspace-data/file-map.json` to configure and support Nx workspace. This file includes details about project files and non-project files for efficient workspace management.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
feat(nx): add initial Nx workspace configuration
Added `.nx/workspace-data/file-map.json` to configure and support Nx workspace. This file includes details about project files and non-project files for efficient workspace management.
